name: @episensor/app-template
description: Template for EpiSensor Tauri desktop applications with Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build:sidecar: npm run build:api && npx esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/server/bundle.cjs --external:sharp --external:canvas --external:bufferutil --external:utf-8-validate --external:serialport && npx pkg dist/server/bundle.cjs --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --out-path src-tauri/binaries --compress GZip && cd src-tauri/binaries && [ -f bundle-macos-arm64 ] && mv bundle-macos-arm64 server-aarch64-apple-darwin || true && [ -f bundle-win-x64.exe ] && mv bundle-win-x64.exe server-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe || true && [ -f bundle-linux-x64 ] && mv bundle-linux-x64 server-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu || true
scripts.setup: npm install && cd web && npm install

author: EpiSensor
